Module edu.ntnu.idatt1002.sysdev_k1_05_ets
Package edu.ntnu.idatt1002.sysdev_k1_05_ets.readersAndWriters

Class TournamentWriter

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt1002.sysdev_k1_05_ets.readersAndWriters.TournamentWriter
public class TournamentWriter extends Object
Class for writing tournament data to a tournament file, as well as managing file location.

  • Method Details

    • ifFileExistsAndFindLocation

      public static String ifFileExistsAndFindLocation(String tournamentNameShortened)
      Method checks if the file exists, and if it does, it will return the relative location. Used for finding out which folder we are working with, and if there is a file already existing with the name you intend to use.
      Parameters:
      tournamentNameShortened - name of the tournament, shortened.
      Returns:
      String of location

    • writeNewTournamentToFileWithBasicInfo

      public static void writeNewTournamentToFileWithBasicInfo(String status, String tournamentName, String tournamentHost, LocalDate date, LocalTime time, String description, String game, String platform, String tournamentType, int numberOfTeams, int prizePool, String prizePoolCurrency, int entranceFee, String entranceFeeCurrency) throws IOException
      Takes in all basic tournament attributes as parameters (Everything except teams and matches), and then writes the tournament to file, in a custom designed format. then checks if the tournament is either an ongoing or upcoming tournament. Then it writes the tournament to a file which is placed in either the ongoing or upcoming folder. It also uses the writeTournamentToOngoingOverview() or writeTournamentToUpcomingOverview() to write the tournament to an overview file.
      Parameters:
      status - status of the tournament, e.g. "Not finished"
      tournamentName - name ot the tournament, String
      tournamentHost - host of the tournament, only "Admin" for now, String
      date - date of the tournament, LocalDate
      time - time of the tournament, LocalTime
      description - description of the tournament, String
      game - game played at tournament, String
      platform - platform the game is played on, String
      tournamentType - type of tournament, only "Brackets" for now, String
      numberOfTeams - number of teams playing, only "4", "8" or "16" for now, String
      Throws:
      IOException - if data cannot be written to file or upcoming overview.

    • writeTournamentToOngoingOverview

      public static void writeTournamentToOngoingOverview(String tournamentNameShortened) throws IOException
      Takes in the shortened tournament name and writes it into the ongoing overview file. This makes it easier to later locate the individual tournament files.
      Parameters:
      tournamentNameShortened - name of the tournament
      Throws:
      IOException - if tournament name cannot be written to overview

    • writeTournamentToUpcomingOverview

      public static void writeTournamentToUpcomingOverview(String tournamentNameShortened) throws IOException

      Parameters:
      tournamentNameShortened - name of the tournament, String
      Throws:
      IOException - if tournament name cannot be written to overview

    • writeTournamentToPreviousOverview

      public static void writeTournamentToPreviousOverview(String tournamentName) throws IOException

    • getPathToTournamentFileAsString

      public static String getPathToTournamentFileAsString(String tournamentName) throws IOException
      Method to find which folder (ongoing-, upcoming- or previous tournaments) the file of a tournament is located in.
      Parameters:
      tournamentName - name of the tournament, String
      Returns:
      File path of the tournament
      Throws:
      IOException - if tournament file could not be found

    • writeTeamsToTournamentFile

      public static void writeTeamsToTournamentFile(String tournamentName, ArrayList<Team> teams) throws IOException
      Method writes teams to an already existing tournament file. Method takes in an arraylist of teams, and a shortened tournament name as parameter, for easily finding file location. It writes out the whole file to an arraylist, and adds or replaces index 11 (teams) with the new teams taken in as a parameter. It then writes the whole file back to the original file path. Can also be used to edit teams if matches has been set, but this functionality has not been implemented.
      Parameters:
      tournamentName - name of the tournament, String
      teams - teams to be added to tournament, ArrayList
      Throws:
      IOException - if file does not exist or if file cannot be written to,

    • updateTournamentFileLocation

      public static void updateTournamentFileLocation() throws IOException
      Method updates location of the tournament files, bases on the tournament's start date, and whether it's finished. Method only moves upcoming tournaments to ongoing tournaments, and ongoing tournament to previous tournaments.
      Throws:
      IOException - if file can not be found, if file can not be read through or if file can not be written to.

    • removeTournamentFromUpcomingOverview

      public static void removeTournamentFromUpcomingOverview(String tournamentNameShortened) throws IOException
      Method removes tournament name from upcoming overview

      Throws:
      IOException - if file could be read or written to.

    • writeMatchesToTournament

      public static void writeMatchesToTournament(String tournamentName, Match inputMatch) throws IOException
      Parses through the tournament file, and takes the last lines containing the match information for the tournament and places them in an array containing all the information. Afterwards it iterates through the teams and places them in corresponding matches based on position in array. Every time this method is called it will look for winner of each match, and using the index of the match will place it into the new position. Each power of 2 represents one round further so the index is simply divided by two.
      Parameters:
      tournamentName - Takes in tournament name to open the file
      inputMatch - Takes in a match that is being modified to tournament
      Throws:
      IOException - if tournament file could not be found, read or written to.
